title: Add randomWalk Stream Evaluator to support time series simulations
description: Now that we have Monte Carlo simulations and Markov Chain support it would be useful to add a randomWalk function to support time series simulations. The randomWalk function will utilize the probability distribution framework and soon to be committed time series differencing function SOLR-11571.

comments.content: Move issue from deprecated 'In  Progress' back to 'Open'
comments.author: Gavin
